functions.name: defender_for_cloudworkspace_high_severity_alerts_notify
functions.description: Checks if high severity alerts notification is enabled for Defender for Cloudworkspace.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Defender_For_Cloudworkspace API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
